segments.text: I see this cozy kitchen with sunlight streaming in from the window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is carefully drying a plate, looking so focused and content.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Behind her, the kids are up to something sneaky with the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is climbing on that wobbly stool, reaching in for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is right there, hand out, waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's adorable how they're conspiring together without mom noticing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks peaceful, with neat bushes and a path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But oh no, the sink is overflowing, water pouring everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's standing in the puddle but doesn't even realize it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is just too funny, like a cartoon come to life.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the stool holds; the boy's stretching so far.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookies must be tempting them a lot to risk it.
segments.speaker: PAR
